content: Hi, could anyone advise how to get some help with extending an existing module please? I have posted an issue in the module's Github project but not received any response.

Hi, Stuart Brown. Welcome to the Backdrop CMS community on Zulip. I'm your friendly neighborhood Dragonbot. Try '@Dragonbot help' for a list of things I can help you with. There are lots of friendly humans that hang around here, so please feel free to ask questions.

Here is a short (3 min) video to help you navigate Zulip. https://youtu.be/DN8YL2MrsSU

Specifically I'm trying to get a view to sort on Statistics fields. Currently the module only allows for fields to be displayed. I need to extend the views_handler_sort, but so far am unable to get the statistics fields to load correctly for sorting. I think I know what's going wrong, but am unable to fix with my lack of php coding skills...
Suspected was my fault. Will check as soon as I can.
@docwilmot thanks. I'll post in the issue queue with more about what's going on. I suspect it was left out of the module because it wasn't a straight-forward fix...
Pm me if you suspect I forgot
